item.title: How to Install Nginx, MySQL and PHP (LEMP Stack) on Ubuntu 16.04 / Ubuntu 14.04
item.description: LEMP is the acronym for Linux + Nginx + MySQL + PHP. It is also known as LNMP (which is unpronounceable, so we’ll call it LEMP). The following tutorial is for Ubuntu versions 16.04.x and 14.04.x. However, we would always recommend to use the latest version to avoid bugs from lower ones. We recommend you following the instructions as the root user. To switch to the root user, use the command sudo -i.
